segments.text: The cookie jar is the center of all this trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking his neck for a snack, and the girl is just standing there, waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless they’re being, and the woman is completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and the floor is wet—what could go wrong?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice the water or the kids behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is almost funny, but it’s also kind of sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is so calm, and yet inside, it’s pure madness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before this gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
